pm_1_0_std.docs:
Use the concentration of particulates of size less than 1.0µm in µg per cubic meter at standard particle. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMSX003 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsx003.html#configuration-variables)*

pm_2_5_std.docs:
Use the concentration of particulates of size less than 2.5µm in µg per cubic meter at standard particle. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMSX003 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsx003.html#configuration-variables)*

pm_10_0_std.docs:
Use the concentration of particulates of size less than 10.0µm in µg per cubic meter at standard particle. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMSX003 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsx003.html#configuration-variables)*

pm_1_0.docs:
Use the concentration of particulates of size less than 1.0µm in µg per cubic meter under atmospheric environment. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMSX003 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsx003.html#configuration-variables)*

pm_2_5.docs:
Use the concentration of particulates of size less than 2.5µm in µg per cubic meter under atmospheric environment. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMSX003 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsx003.html#configuration-variables)*

pm_10_0.docs:
Use the concentration of particulates of size less than 10.0µm in µg per cubic meter under atmospheric environment. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMSX003 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsx003.html#configuration-variables)*

pm_0_3um.docs:
Use the number of particles with diameter beyond 0.3um in 0.1L of air. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMSX003 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsx003.html#configuration-variables)*

pm_0_5um.docs:
Use the number of particles with diameter beyond 0.5um in 0.1L of air. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMSX003 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsx003.html#configuration-variables)*

pm_1_0um.docs:
Use the number of particles with diameter beyond 1.0um in 0.1L of air. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMSX003 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsx003.html#configuration-variables)*

pm_2_5um.docs:
Use the number of particles with diameter beyond 2.5um in 0.1L of air. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMSX003 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsx003.html#configuration-variables)*

pm_5_0um.docs:
Use the number of particles with diameter beyond 5.0um in 0.1L of air. Not supported by the `PMS5003T` type sensors. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMSX003 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsx003.html#configuration-variables)*

pm_10_0um.docs:
Use the number of particles with diameter beyond 10.0um in 0.1L of air. Not supported by the `PMS5003T` type sensors. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMSX003 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsx003.html#configuration-variables)*

temperature.docs:
Use the temperature value in °C for the `PMS5003T` and `PMS5003ST` type sensors. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMSX003 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsx003.html#configuration-variables)*

humidity.docs:
Use the humidity value in % for the `PMS5003T` and `PMS5003ST` type sensors. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMSX003 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsx003.html#configuration-variables)*

formaldehyde.docs:
Use the formaldehyde (HCHO) concentration in µg per cubic meter for the `PMS5003S` and `PMS5003ST` type sensors. All options from [Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/index.html#config-sensor).

*See also: [PMSX003 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsx003.html#configuration-variables)*

update_interval.docs:
Amount of time to wait between generating measurements. If this is longer than 30 seconds, and if `tx_pin` is set in the UART configuration, the fan will be spun down between measurements. Default to `0s` (forward data as it’s coming in from the sensor).

*See also: [PMSX003 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsx003.html#configuration-variables)*

uart_id.docs:
**[ID](https://esphome.io/guides/configuration-types.html#config-id)**: Manually specify the ID of the [UART Component](https://esphome.io/components/uart.html#uart) if you want to use multiple UART buses.

*See also: [PMSX003 Particulate Matter Sensor](https://esphome.io/components/sensor/pmsx003.html#configuration-variables)*
